moves.name: Rototiller
moves.description: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type Pokémon.

moves.name: Night Slash
moves.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Tri Attack
moves.description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Scratch
moves.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Astonish
moves.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

moves.name: Magnitude
moves.description: The user looses a ground-shaking quake affecting everyone around the user. Its power varies.

moves.name: Bulldoze
moves.description: The user stomps down on the ground and attacks everything in the area. Hit Pokémon's Speed stat is reduced.

moves.name: Sucker Punch
moves.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.

moves.name: Sand Tomb
moves.description: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for four to five turns.

moves.name: Mud Bomb
moves.description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Earth Power
moves.description: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

moves.name: Dig
moves.description: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.

moves.name: Slash
moves.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes those around it.

moves.name: Fissure
moves.description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target instantly faints if it hits.
